scripts.ci:release:production: changeset add --empty || true && changeset version && git diff-index --quiet HEAD || (git add . && git commit -m "chore: release stable version" && git tag -a v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") -m "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") $(git log --format=%B $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0 2>/dev/null || echo HEAD~10)..HEAD)" && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --title "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" --notes "$(git log --format=%B $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0 2>/dev/null || echo HEAD~10)..HEAD)")
scripts.ci:release:staging: changeset pre enter rc && (changeset add --empty || true) && changeset version && git diff-index --quiet HEAD || (git add . && git commit -m "chore: release rc version" && git tag -a v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-rc -m "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-rc $(git log --format=%B $(git describe --tags --match "v*-rc" --abbrev=0 2>/dev/null || echo HEAD~10)..HEAD)" && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-rc --prerelease --title "Release Candidate v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-rc" --notes "$(git log --format=%B $(git describe --tags --match "v*-rc" --abbrev=0 2>/dev/null || echo HEAD~10)..HEAD)") && changeset pre exit
scripts.ci:release:dev: changeset pre enter beta && (changeset add --empty || true) && changeset version && git diff-index --quiet HEAD || (git add . && git commit -m "chore: release beta version" && git tag -a v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-beta -m "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-beta $(git log --format=%B $(git describe --tags --match "v*-beta" --abbrev=0 2>/dev/null || echo HEAD~10)..HEAD)" && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-beta --prerelease --title "Beta Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-beta" --notes "$(git log --format=%B $(git describe --tags --match "v*-beta" --abbrev=0 2>/dev/null || echo HEAD~10)..HEAD)") && changeset pre exit
